recipesJson.name: Rose Lemonade
recipesJson.author: Wodde
recipesJson.description:
Sparkling and refreshing Roselemonade, like the known and loved Soda :)
Enjoy :)

reviews.text: It’s that damned FA Rose. Its yuckiness comes though, just a bit, even with a bunch of citrus piled on top. This would be a lovely lemon-lime soda without it. It even has an effervescent feel to it before the more syrupy and very sweet but not ridiculously sweet finish. I’d probably vape the hell out of this if it featured any number of other fruit or floral flavors on top, just not that damned FA Rose.
